name: bj-dvv
body: |- wb(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))

body.origin: |- wb(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))

cumulated.origin: |- wb(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))

comment: A special instance of ~ bj-hbaeb2 . A lemma for distinct var metavariables. Note that the right-hand side is a closed formula (a sentence). (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2018.)
